description: at L is a bald man holding a long stick, one foot on an inclined board; inscriptions in black ink on R side; on light brown paper; top and bottom border and futai (decorative ties) made of black and gold floral brocade; outer border at top and bottom of aged brown silk; tan tightly woven fabric at top and bottom of mount; black lacquer(?) roller knobs; woven hanging cord at top
inscription: inscriptions in Japanese at TR and BL of painting; sheet of paper loose in box with Japanese writing; verso paper: c.a. 1736-1740 a.d. ; handwritten on note on top of box: 3524 / Small / Ink Painting on Paper / Shubun / 18th Century / man working - / 34 / Kyo Trading Co. / S-44 / Anonymous / Hanging Scroll Monks / R17
markings: red seal at BL of painting; labels on side of box: R17 / 35124 JAPAN
signed: 立圃書; red seal 松翁
title: Farmer pounding rice
